services-marketing-page: Digital Marketing in Santos | Zakta Technology
marketing-page-text-1: In addition to being present on the web, whether with a website, virtual store or system, it is also necessary to properly publicize your project and thus have more chances of achieving your results.
marketing-page-text-2: Zakta has a team specialized in Digital Marketing to help promote your business on the web in different ways:
marketing-page-text-4: : We create and update your business listing on Google, providing key information, photos, hours and contacts.
marketing-page-text-6: : We provide Content Marketing strategies with texts and posts to get hits, attract customers and make sales.
marketing-page-text-8: : We are specialists in creating and managing Google Adwords campaigns to carry out ads on Google seeking more access to your site.
